Text: Can anyone suggest where could I get English subs for this and taris?
Sorry to say but there is no sub on Internet. Try to watch it with a good french listener :)

@bharatrn A.propos.de.Nice.1930 is a silent movie so you don't need sub. Here's the sub for Taris.
